item.description:
In honor of Master Chen's upcoming visit I will be teaching Chen Tai
Chi at the Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts located at:

40 Stowe St.
Concord, MA 01742

Dates: September 5 - October 24.

Saturday mornings 9-11
Thursday evening 6:30 - 8 PM

These classes are free, but preregistration is required and classes will be
taught as for "outdoor students"
item.how_to_find_us: Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts, 40 Stowe St., Concord, MA 01742
item.name: Boston Chen Tai Chi Meetup
